data.approach: Create ProjectCard.svelte first with project info display (name, path, port, description, color badges, edit/delete buttons), then ProjectsList.svelte with grid layout, New Project button, loading/error states following RulesList pattern

Create ProjectCard component for individual project display with name, path, port, color badges, description, edit/delete buttons. Create ProjectsList component as a grid container with New Project button and loading/error states. Follow the RulesList pattern from automation.

summary: Created ProjectCard.svelte component for displaying individual project configurations with name, path, port, color badges, description, edit/delete/visibility buttons
Created ProjectsList.svelte component with grid of project cards, New Project button, loading/error states, and collapsible hidden projects section
Both components follow the RulesList pattern from automation with consistent styling and behavior
Components integrate with configStore for reactive state management
